Cuckoo Cop

This action, romance and adventure story will keep you on the edge of your seat. Here is a story about a corrupt cop who will pay the ultimate price of stealing drugs of one of the most powerful people in NYC. Wealthy cop or too wealthy? Is Gordon Bolton trying to drag Charlie into scandal or is he on his side forever? It starts in a city far far away called New York. Charlie pays the price of having blood on his hands and money in his pocket. His wife thinks about the welfare of the kids and leaves Charlie wondering what to do next. In a race against time to save the people he loves and to destroy Gordon Bolton once and for all... What would you do?
